title: Generate sensitive data (AKS)
content:
The outcome of this step is the creation of a Kubernetes secret named oo-secret, which holds the required sensitive data that OO Containerized needs at install time.

The name of this Kubernetes secret is in the Helm parameter global.initSecrets in the OO values.yaml file. At OO install time, its data is automatically consumed by the deployed OO pods.  

Use the gen_secrets.sh script from OPTIC Management Toolkit to prepare the sensitive data.

  1. Run the following command on the bastion node:

    OMT_External_K8s_2x.x-xxx/scripts/gen_secrets.sh -n <OO NAMESPACE> -c <OO CHART FILE>
    Where:
    • <OO NAMESPACE> = the unique namespace of the OO deployment. Use the namespace that you specified in the Create a new deployment for OO (AKS) topic.
    • <OO CHART FILE> = the absolute path of the OO chart file.
    For example: 
    OMT_External_K8s_2x.x-xxx/scripts/gen_secrets.sh -n oo -c oo-helm-charts-1.x.x+26.x.x/oo-helm-charts/charts/oo-1.x.x+26.x.x.tgz

  2. The Vault secret utility prompts you for the following passwords. 

    Vault Secrets

    Key

    Required?

    Description
    idm_admin_admin_password

    Yes

    		 Enter the password of the oo-integration-admin user. You created this user as part of the preparation step Create OO integration admin user in the Service Management IdM.
    OO_CENTRAL_DB_PASS

    Yes

    The password of the OO Central database user, which you created as part of the preparation step Prepare Database for OO.
    OO_AUTOPASS_DB_PASS Yes The password of the AutoPass database user, which you created as part of the preparation step Prepare Database for OO.
    OO_IDM_DB_PASS No

    Ignore this request, as it belongs to a beta feature of OO which isn't yet available. 

    Press ENTER when prompted for this data. Doing so will generate a random string that isn't used by OO.
    OO_CONTROLLER_DB_PASS Yes The password of the OO Controller database user, which you created as part of the preparation step Prepare Database for OO.
    ITOM_DB_PASSWD_KEY

    No

    Ignore this request, as it belongs to a beta feature of OO which isn't yet available. 

    Press ENTER when prompted for this data. Doing so will generate a random string that isn't used by OO.
    idm_transport_admin_password

    Yes

    		 Enter the password of the suite IDM transport user. You obtained the password as part of the preparation step Get connection details for connecting to the Service Management IdM.
    OO_UI_DB_PASS

    Yes

    		 The password of the OO Session Manager database user, which you created as part of the preparation step Prepare Database for OO.
    OO_SCHEDULER_DB_PASS

    Yes

    		 The password of the OO Scheduler database user, which you created as part of the preparation step Prepare Database for OO.
  3. A message that resembles the following indicates that you successfully created the OO secret. 
    [INFO] Creating the K8s secret... oo-secret
[INFO] Done
[INFO] Secret name: oo-secret
